column4: I'm playing around with Ubuntu on my spare computer. I'm trying to run XGL as described in http://www.tectonic.co.za/view.php?id=916.  I have the output of  .xsession-errors, but it's too big to paste here. This is the most interesting line though, "GdkPixbuf-CRITICAL **: gdk_pixbuf_scale_simple: assertion `dest_width > 0' failed". I'm a computer programmer with debug experience, but a linux noob. Please help, I've been working on this fo
#ubuntu-xgl for XGL questions, and, we have a pastebin
set your hardware to local time, and there's an option for that in the timezone settings in linux
